1.TITLE: sEMILLA INFANT SCHOOL
1.TEXT1: Our Nursery School 'Semilla' is located at Wallaby Street, number 42, in the municipality of Sidney, within the province of Invent.
1.TEXT2: With a total of 100 students between the ages of 2 and 5, divided into 4 classes.

2.TITLE: THE BEST PROFESSIONALS
2.TEXT: Among our staff of professionals are educators who will promote the autonomous growth of students.

3.TITLE: WOODEN TOOLS
3.TEXT: All the objects used in the work areas of our school are made of polished wood and are totally suitable for children's use.

4.TITLE: EDUCATION IN VALUES
4.TEXT: During childhood, education in values ​​such as caring for the environment are especially important. That is why we promote actions such as recycling.

5.TITLE: DEVELOPMENT OF ARTISTIC SKILLS
5.TEXT: We believe that the cognitive development of minors through the use of the arts is essential: painting, music, dance, theater, etc...

6.TITLE: USE OF MONTESSORI METHODOLOGY
6.TEXT: Promoting autonomy is one of our primary objectives and we work on it through the Monstessori methodology.

OVERLAY.2: Are you a familiar or guardian?
OVERLAY.5: Do you belong to the faculty?
